results.title: The AMPK activator metformin improves recovery from demyelination by shifting oligodendrocyte bioenergetics and accelerating OPC differentiation
results.text_hl: In summary, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ dramatically alters metabolism and accelerates oligodendroglial differentiation both in health and following @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Central_Nervous_System_Demyelinating_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020279 @@@myelin damage@@@.

results.title: Metformin exacerbates and simvastatin attenuates myelin damage in high fat diet-fed C57BL/6 J mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ exacerbates and @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Hereditary_Central_Nervous_System_Demyelinating_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020279 @@@myelin damage@@@ in high fat diet-fed @CELLLINE_CVCL:C0MW @@@C57BL/6 J@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.
